item.title: Data-Driven ROPE Analysis
item.description: About this post I’ve decided to write a brief disclaimer about this post. Please, please, please don’t use this post for statistical advice. This post is mostly thinking out loud about a possible method of hypothesis testing, but in fact it just reinvents existing methods in a noisy way. Looking at the post again a few months later, I’m convinced it doesn’t tell us anything we can’t already garner from existing methods.
